Read me

This app implemented the on-demand feature for WireGuard Android.
  1. For avoid app to be killed, please turn on Autostart; and set Battery saver to "No restrictions". How to adjust
  2. For get Wifi SSID, please grant "Allowed all the time" for App location permissions.
  3. Grant WireGuard permission by adb on computer. run the below command on Windows console.

    adb shell pm grant com.claudejiang.wghelper com.wireguard.android.permission.CONTROL_TUNNELS
Input wifi ssids, split by comma
The WireGuard name configured in WireGuard App
If connected to wifi with these ssids, will turn off WireGuard. \n If keep empty, will turn off WireGuard when connected to any wifi.
